item.title: Seminyak Private Hotel
item.description:
Seminyak Private Hotel

Uniquely known as a 'private hotel', located beachfront in the heart of fashionable Seminyak, Luna2 private hotel offers superstar services of an exclusive hotel with the intimacy of a private home. This exclusive-use, five-bedroomed private hotel sleeps approximately 10 people and is the ultimate holiday destination for groups of singles or couples, with or without children.
